WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DOMINICAN REPUBLIC.
DNC 16.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM M/V MARELLA DISCOVERY,
2542 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN 20-21.10N 071-53.50W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC MIAMI,
